description: Shrine-hopping adventure through Tokyo for goshuin collection, then departing for Mount Fuji area. Multiple beautiful shrines in Harajuku/Shibuya area before traveling to Kawaguchiko for ryokan stay.

activities.description: Check out of accommodation in Ebisu area, head to Shinjuku Station
Travel from Ebisu to Shinjuku Station via JR Yamanote Line
Drop off bags in coin locker or luggage storage at Shinjuku Station
Travel from Shinjuku to Meiji Shrine area via JR Yamanote Line
Walk from Meiji Shrine to Togo-jinja Shrine in Harajuku area
Walk to Harajuku lunch area via Omotesando or Cat Street
Lunch in Harajuku - explore Omotesando, Cat Street, or backstreets of Harajuku
Walk from Harajuku to Onden Shrine in Shibuya area
Short walk to Kitaya Inari Shrine in nearby Shibuya area
Walk to Miyamasumitake Shrine in central Shibuya
Walk from Miyamasumitake Shrine to Shibuya Station
Arrive at Shibuya Station - brief rest and preparation for return to Shinjuku
Return to Shinjuku Station to retrieve luggage for Mount Fuji departure
‚ö†Ô∏è CRITICAL: Arrive at Shinjuku Station and retrieve your luggage, Find Platform 10 for Kaiji 35

reservations.description: Traditional Japanese ryokan accommodation in Kawaguchiko with Mount Fuji views and kaiseki dinner

reservations.name: Limited Express Kaiji 35
reservations.description: CRITICAL reserved seats on Limited Express from Shinjuku to ≈åtsuki - Platform 10 departure at 15:30 sharp! Last train to Mount Fuji today

reservations.name: Fujisan View Express 13
reservations.description: Reserved seats on scenic train from ≈åtsuki to Kawaguchiko with Mount Fuji views - connects from Limited Express Kaiji 35

transportation: JR Yamanote Line (¬•170 per trip), Limited Express Kaiji + Fujisan View Express to Kawaguchiko, taxi to ryokan

travelRoutes.name: Ebisu to Shinjuku Station
travelRoutes.description: Morning journey from Shibuya accommodation area to Shinjuku for shrine hopping departure

travelRoutes.name: Shinjuku to Harajuku Station
travelRoutes.description: Travel to shrine hopping starting point in Harajuku area near Meiji Shrine

travelRoutes.name: Shinjuku to Kawaguchiko Station
travelRoutes.description: Complete Mount Fuji journey via Limited Express Kaiji 35 and Fujisan View Express to reach ryokan destination

meals: Breakfast: Light meal before departure, Lunch: Harajuku/Omotesando restaurants, Dinner: Traditional ryokan kaiseki
budget: ¬•15,000 - ¬•25,000 (includes train tickets ¬•3,000+, shrine donations, meals, taxi, ryokan)
notes: GOSHUIN COLLECTION DAY! üö® CRITICAL TRAIN: Limited Express Kaiji 35 at 15:30 from Platform 10 - MUST NOT MISS!
